name: Sugar Rush (itch) (itsohclay)
description:
This game is for the Weekly Game  Jam
Theme: Unconventional Superpower
Description:  
Your power is Sugar Rush ~ every time you have too much sugar it activates your all your adrenaline in your body forcing you to have to run at super speeds. Try your best to avoid obstacles.
Controls: 
A or Left Arrow - Move Left  
D or Right Arrow Move Right
Assets:
- Kenney's Assets
